channel.title: Nick Karwoski on nickkarwoski.com
channel.description: Recent content in Nick Karwoski on nickkarwoski.com

item.title: Other Photography Work
item.description: I’ve published a few books with my wife which help teach reading the Montessori way. https://www.amazon.com/dp/B098J95XXG

item.title: Bicycle Explorers Club Book
item.description: Hello! I’ve been taking photographs and going on bicycle tours since 2013. I’ve accumulated so many pictures and life lessons from both. I decided to combine them by creating Bicycle Explorers Club: Photography + Stories of Bicycle Touring a booklet magazine type thing. I couldn’t find anything else like it so I thought it should exist. Here is the link if you are interested: https://www.amazon.com/Bicycle-Explorers-Club-Photography-Stories/dp/B095GDFKQ7/

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you feel compelled to make me an offer I can’t refuse message me at: myfirstandlastname @ gmail dot com. https://www.instagram.com/bicycleexplorersclub

item.title: Sand County Caress
item.description: I recently completed a 2013-2021 labor of love and a life goal of mine. Creating a bikepacking route and publishing it. You can check it out here https://bikepacking.com/routes/sand-county-caress/
